constituent: intelligent, loincloth, retainer, slave, crotch, shellfish, clam, oyster, eye, animal legs, eight
koohiiStory1: An intelligent man is neither slave to his crotch nor to money. But an intelligent slave will know how to use his/her crotch to make money.
koohiiStory2: Every intelligent man is a slave to two things, his: 1) crotch, and 2) money.
myStory: thông minh. khôn. đặt chỗ thêm nữa với vỏ sò.
words:
賢明(けんめい): wisdom, intelligence, prudence
賢い(かしこい): wise, clever, smart
